review_data.title: Schmackhaftes Essen
review_data.content: Sehr gutes Gemüsedal, schmackhaft und nicht fettig! Studentenpreise wären noch top, aber es ist auch so nicht teuer (grosse Pportionen)

review_data.title: Vegan delights
review_data.content: This take out restaurant offers interesting vegan delights. As good as it is, it is a bit pricey though.

review_data.title: Fantastic
review_data.content: I travel a lot and one coffee shop blends into another after a while but this place was something different. Finding good quality vegan fare is not always easy and this place is well worth a visit. The cake was sublime.

review_data.title: raw cake
review_data.content: OH MY GOD!!!!!!!!!! Guys, you have to try the raw vegan lemon cheesecake!!! And the raw vegan Bounty cake and the raw vegan Chocolate cake!!! It's heaven!!! Pure heaven!

review_data.title: Great Vegan options

review_data.title: Great drinks, Super staffperson Erik
review_data.content: I stopped by here for a beverage, as I had a special promotional offer. Klara’s Kitchen is located close to the University (Tram 9/10, between Universitatspital and Haldenegg stop). They offer a variety of Bio and Vegan snacks, treats, salads, sandwiches, wraps, bagels, ice cream,...More
